issue_name: Multiple Nation-State Threat Actors Exploit CVE-2022-47966 and CVE-2022-42475

1.description: The apache server has to be stopped in order to patch the system. This is done via: service apache2 stop

2.description: Update the whole linux server using the command: sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y

3.description: Patch the Zoho ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus to the latest version to mitigate CVE-2022-47966.

4.description: Patch all firewall security appliances to mitigate CVE-2022-42475.

5.command: Monitor for unauthorized use of remote access software
5.description: Use endpoint detection tools to monitor for unauthorized use of remote access software.

6.description: Remove unnecessary (disabled) accounts and groups from the enterprise that are no longer needed, especially privileged accounts.
